1201430.name: X-Plane 11 - Add-on: Aerosoft - Airport Malaga XP
1201430.description:
The Airport Malaga – Costa del Sol is the busiest airport in the Spanish region Andalusia, offering connections to and from the whole world. This highly detailed recreation for XPlane 11 allows you to discover the distinctive flair of the Spanish province. For this purpose we have made sure to create a true to original model of the airport area, but also covered the city of Malaga with high resolution, 0.5m/px satellite images and hand placed city objects.


  • Fully customized SAM gates
  • Animated Ground traffic
  • World traffic ready
  • Over 180 km² of high-resolution satellite images (0.5m/px) covering the city of Málaga and the airport environment
  • City objects
  • Static Ground objects
  • Added PBR
  • Customized night lightning
1201430.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
